title: LegalBasis
description: A legal basis is a reason used to justify processing of personal data. Applicable legal bases are defined by legislations.

legalBasisType.description: Specifies the legal basis type on which the processing relies

description.example: Article L323-2 du Code de commerce sur la conversation des documents comptables
description.description: Provides a description of the legal basis (including any additional legal text to refer to)
